title: A Foreign Affair

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Great Britain - Foreign relations
description: Episode of Series "High Office". A dictator comes to power in a former British colony. Conditions in his country deteriorate but business opportunities for Britain are good. The program examines how the British government might view the request for a royal visit and how it would react to rumours of an impending coup against the new regime
